message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You wanted 60-40, now it's 70-30. Consider this a compromise!
You're pushing too hard, let's meet in the middle at 55-45
Meeting in the middle is a good start, but I can do better than that. Consider this a more generous offer!
I'll meet you at 50-50, but I think we can do better than that. Let's aim for a more equal split!
I'm not quite there yet, but I'm willing to compromise. This is a more balanced offer, let's see if it works for you!
I'm not giving up yet! I'll meet you halfway between our last two offers. Let's try 47.5-52.5%
